name: PDF Chat bot
description: The PDF Chatbot is a personal AI-driven project designed to enhance document accessibility by converting PDF files into searchable text and enabling users to ask context-aware questions based on the extracted content. Hosted on Streamlit, the chatbot leverages Google Generative AI, LangChain, and LangChain-Community for intelligent conversational capabilities. It uses PyPDF2 for PDF processing and ChromaDB & FAISS-CPU as vector databases for efficient information retrieval. The integration of Python-Dotenv ensures seamless environment configuration. This project simplifies knowledge extraction from large technical documents, making information retrieval faster, smarter, and more user-friendly.
